list.details: 1. Guides and hidden tips for those who are new to karting or want to do well.
2. This site is We comply with Nexon Game IP User Guide (as of 2021.06.22) Therefore, we do not generate revenue or advertise through this at all. .

3. I made this site because I was very sad to hear the news that the service of the original Kartrider was finalized and I wished for the success of Kartrider Drift.
Since it is a simple project made for the hobby of a producer, Nexon It has nothing to do with Korea.
